Name: Carroll Gardens
Ingredients: 50 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: This delightfully spirit-forward riff on the Brooklyn is the most Italian American of cocktails.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008-9 by Joaquín Simó at Death & Company in New York City, in honour of his local neighbourhood, Brooklyn's Carroll Gardens.
